title: ambikaiyE aruL
sahitya:
ambikaiyE aruL purivAi jagad-


anupallavi

  ambarattOrum aDi paNindiDa veLLi ambalattADum haran magizhndiDum mIna-


caraNam    malayadvaja pANDiyan magizhvura madalaiyAi vanduditta marakatAngi
 maNi makuTam shUDi madhurApuri AL un malaraDi paNindEn manam kaLindEn jagad-
